column1: Name / Purpose
[title_desc name="3DRipperDX" desc="Rip DirectX content from games" /]
[title_desc name="Alura & Zoe for Nightfire" desc="Tools which can decompress and compress Nightfire's .007 archives." /]
[title_desc name="Animation timing tools" desc="Tools for aiding in the creation of animations for view player models" /]
[title_desc name="ATI hammer fix" desc="AMD dropped opengl support at one stage for their drivers and this helps rectify the issue" /]
[title_desc name="BZIP2" desc="Compression tool used to create small files that can be transmitted by servers to gamers" /]
[title_desc name="BZIP2 tool" desc="GUI frontend for BZIP2" /]
[title_desc name="Cached.wad and gfx.wad SDK" desc="WAD Compiler" /]
[title_desc name="cf sdktools" desc="Here are compiled versions of some of the tools from the source sdk released on 12/1/2004." /]
[title_desc name="Collective Valve ERC Entity Documentation" desc="Documentation for the goldsrc sdk entities" /]
[title_desc name="Content Installer Multi game" desc="Content installer for some source games" /]
[title_desc name="CTX Converter" desc="Ctx converter removes the hassle of having to type in correct cmd commands to decompile ctx files" /]
[title_desc name="Cue List Tool" desc="Create cues in WAV sound files" /]
[title_desc name="Custom Compiler GUI" desc="Allows users to change the settings for the compiler(s) they wish to run" /]
[title_desc name="Custom Content Manager" desc="Manages custom content for source engine games" /]
[title_desc name="Demo freak" desc="a tool for game replays recorded with Half-Life." /]
[title_desc name="DuctTape" desc="A development integration and project building tool for Source Engine modders." /]
[title_desc name="Error Checker" desc="Checks for errors in your map" /]
[title_desc name="FGD SublimeText Highlighter" desc="FGD highlighting for Sublime Text editor" /]
[title_desc name="Fixed Steam HD Pack for Half-Life" desc="High definition pack for Half-Life and Opposing Force" /]
[title_desc name="Game Extractor" desc="Extract content from game archive files" /]
[title_desc name="GCF Scape" desc="Defacto tool for extracting content from steam archives" /]
[title_desc name="Gibbeds VPK Extractor + Fixed Version" desc="Extract the contents of VPK files" /]
[title_desc name="GMOD LUA IDE" desc="Development environment for Garrys mod Lua files" /]
[title_desc name="Gold Wave" desc="Sound editing tool, useful for looping by adding cues" /]
[title_desc name="GUI Debug options for HL2DM" desc="Debug options for HL2 Deathmatch" /]
[title_desc name="HardOCP Benchmark" desc="Demo files to benchmark Half-Life 2" /]
[title_desc name="HL Mod Launcher" desc="Launch mods for Half-Life" /]
[title_desc name="Hl2 Model List" desc="Spreadsheet listing HL2 models" /]
[title_desc name="Half-life Advanced Effects (HLAE)" desc="a collection of tools to enrich GoldSrc" /]
[title_desc name="hllib" desc="HLLib is a package library for Half-Life that abstracts several package formats" /]
[title_desc name="MAGX's Tools" desc="A collection of tools to help with modding" /]
[title_desc name="Mod Maker" desc="A collection of tools to help with modding" /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life Mod Folder Creation Tool (modtool)" desc="Automatically makes a blank mod!" /]
[title_desc name="Nightfire Workshop" desc="Workshop tools for creating Nightfire content" /]
[title_desc name="NPP Valve Definition file" desc="Notepad++ syntax highlighting for Valve files" /]
[title_desc name="OmniToolz" desc="OmniToolz is a tweaker made for all games out there!" /]
[title_desc name="OpenVR" desc="Valves VR toolkit for the HTC Vive" /]
[title_desc name="PackBSP" desc="PackBSP is a tool to help automatically manage and pack dependencies in custom maps for games" /]
[title_desc name="PAK Explorer" desc="Pak Explorer is a tool to help view and edit the contents of Qukae II PAK files" /]

[title_desc name="PakScape" desc="PakScape is a PAK and PK3 explorer/creator" /]

[title_desc name="Phoneme Extractor" desc="Very useful tool when working with faceposer and creating dialog" /]
[title_desc name="PiLauncher" desc="PiLauncher lists the mods installed on your favourite games to make them easy to launch" /]
[title_desc name="Res Generator" desc="Generate RES files for your maps" /]
[title_desc name="ResGen" desc="RESGen. A tool to create .res files for Half-Life." /]
[title_desc name="Sassilization Inline Patcher" desc="fixes 'bad inline model number #, worldmodel not yet setup' errors" /]
[title_desc name="Search Valve Wiki through Sublime Text" desc="Sublime Text filter system that searches the Valve wiki for the input text" /]
[title_desc name="Source Engine Automatic Demo Saver (SEADS)" desc="Automatically saves demos recored in source engine games" /]
[title_desc name="Source Game Starter" desc="Makes starting Source based game server as easy as possible" /]
[title_desc name="Source Icon Pack" desc="selection of icons for Valve filetypes making development on windows easier" /]
[title_desc name="Source Multi Tool" desc="Source Multi-Tool is meant as a replacement to Valves Source SDK Launcher" /]
[title_desc name="Source Sauce" desc="Source Sauce is a replacement out-of-game utility for the in-game options menu of Source Games. " /]
[title_desc name="Source SDK Gadget" desc="Windows gadget for the source sdk" /]
[title_desc name="Source SDK Launcher for Portal" desc="Launches source sdk for Portal" /]
[title_desc name="Source Shader Editor" desc="Create custom shaders for Source from a node based interface" /]
[title_desc name="SrcDemo2" desc="Render smoother Source Engine videos, faster." /]
[title_desc name="STEAM Source Mod Manager" desc="This tools manages your custom modifications for your Source based Steam games." /]
[title_desc name="Steam File Manager" desc="Manages custom content for steam games" /]
[title_desc name="Sublime-VDF-Languages" desc="Syntax highlighting for Valve formats in Sublime Text" /]
[title_desc name="TGA Thumbnail Plugin (Thumbplug)" desc="Adds TGA Thumbnails in windows" /]
[title_desc name="ToGL" desc="OpenGL wrapper for Direct3D" /]
[title_desc name="Updated Half-Life Dlls" desc="This new render dll's support transparent models in many new MOD's." /]
[title_desc name="Valve Icon Pack" desc="Collection of icons for valve games" /]
[title_desc name="VconsoleLib" desc="A PoC library for working with the VConsole network protocol." /]
[title_desc name="VDF Parsing library" desc="Valve Data File Parsing library." /]
[title_desc name="VGUI Localization Tool" desc="Easily recreate your gui elements in other languages" /]
[title_desc name="VICE" desc="Vice is Valve's tool for ICE encryption, a trick used mainly to protect weapon script files from modification by server admins." /]
[title_desc name="VIDE" desc="Valve Integrated Development Environment" /]
[title_desc name="VMPI by TopphattWaffle" desc="This is a set of scripts that make VMPI workers easier, vmpi is used for network distributed map compiling" /]
[title_desc name="Vogl" desc="VOGL is a debugger for the OpenGL rendering API intended to be used in the development of video games" /]
[title_desc name="VoglPerf" desc="benchmarking tool for Linux OpenGL games" /]
[title_desc name="VPK Context Menu" desc="This simple script in batch add a button in the windows context menu for create files in VPK format" /]
[title_desc name="VPK tool (for OS X)" desc="Drop items (vpk you want to extract or folders you want to convert to vpk) onto the App Icon" /]
[title_desc name="VTF shell extensions" desc="Add thumbnail support for VTF files in windows" /]
[title_desc name="Wavosaur" desc="Tool to aid in the creation of WAV files" /]
[title_desc name="WC Parser" desc="Parse Source SDK '.wc' files." /]
[title_desc name="Worldcraft Color Editor" desc="Edit the UI colors in Worldcraft" /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life Launch Pad" desc="Half-Life Launch Pad is an application to ease the process of loading mods and maps for Source and GoldSource." /]
[title_desc name="VMF Picker" desc="Great little tool for adding VMF associations to specific Hammer Versions" /]
[title_desc name="KV File Generator (Online Tool)" desc="A utility that automatically generates a formatted .kv file based on your selection." /]
[title_desc name="GMadConv" desc="simple command line program that converts v13 packed addons to v12" /]
[title_desc name="GMad Extractor" desc="simple command line program that converts v13 packed addons to v12" /]
[title_desc name="Source Icon Set " desc="Collection of simple icons for Source related content (This version is from Riintouge)" /]
[title_desc name="Rufio's SDK GUI" desc="A GUI for both VTEX and studiomdl." /]
[title_desc name="Half-Life CGShader" desc="This is a pixel shader for bloom-like effects on any Half-Life engine game." /]
[title_desc name="Demo Cleaner" desc="Just extract this somewhere and drag your demo file onto it and it'll remove all the scoreboards and command menus from demos." /]
[title_desc name="Ear Defender" desc="Silence unwanted and annoying game sounds. (Half-life goldscr engine)" /]
[title_desc name="HL Tools" desc="This is a C# library to manage GoldSrc specific files." /]
[title_desc name="sharpmod" desc="A metamod plugin that allows you to write server side plugins with C# on the GoldSrc engine" /]
[title_desc name="PSI" desc="hlds (goldsrc) logs parser written in C#" /]

[title_desc name="Steam Condenser" desc="This Project aims to provide a parser which parses the log output of the goldsrc hlds engine (Counter-Strike, Half-Life, etc.). There is a parser written with ragel and one written by hand." /]
[title_desc name="Gelendra" desc="A half life dedicated server (goldsrc) management tool written in ruby" /]
[title_desc name="Blaster" desc="Source and GoldSrc Query Tool" /]
[title_desc name="Sourcemod" desc="Source Engine Scripting and Administration" /]
[title_desc name="AMXModX" desc="Half-Life 1 Scripting and Administration" /]
[title_desc name="Demo File Renamer" desc="This tool was manly made to extract out the mapname of GoldSrc- and Source Engine demofiles and place it in the name of the demofile itself." /]
[title_desc name="Lawena Recording Tool" desc="Simple movie recording tool for Source Engine games" /]
[title_desc name="uSource" desc="Simple movie recording tool for Source Engine games" /]
[title_desc name="Source360" desc="A collection of tools and libraries for the Source Engine on the Xbox 360" /]
[title_desc name="CCConverter" desc="tool for converting closed-captions files for Source engine games" /]
[title_desc name="HL2 Toolkit" desc="An assortment of java classes for working with the source engine" /]
[title_desc name="HL2 Utils" desc="An assortment of java programs for working with the source engine" /]
[title_desc name="Steam Utils" desc="Miscellaneous programs which use Steam data" /]
[title_desc name="Steam Toolkit" desc="For working with the same data Steam relies on" /]
[title_desc name="HL2 Hud Editor" desc="An ambitious attempt at providing a WYSIWYG HUD editor for Source based games" /]
[title_desc name="Demo.JS" desc="TF2 demo parsing in javascript" /]
[title_desc name="Sourceless" desc="C# library for reading/parsing & writing demo files produced by GoldSource (HL1) and Source-engine (HL2) based games" /]

[title_desc name="netdecode" desc="netdecode is a utility for parsing and analysing data within demo files produced by Valve's Source engine (only the Orange Box branch for now). This is primarily a tool for testing and reference. Poorly written in C#." /]
[title_desc name="VGUI.JS" desc="Javascript parser for valve gui files -- ported from optf2's vgui.py" /]

[title_desc name="WebGL Source Engine Renderer" desc="WebGL app that renders levels from the Source Engine, created against Team Fortress 2 resources. The Source Engine and anything related to it is the property of Valve Software, who does not authorize or endorse this project in any way." /]
[title_desc name="Source VM" desc="This is a simple interpreter library for the Source Config." /]
[title_desc name="Source Script" desc="This is a simple interpreter library for the Source Config." /]
[title_desc name="Source CMD" desc="Allows console commands to be sent to source-engine games (hl2.exe). Works with text-mode clients." /]
[title_desc name="vguilocalizationtool" desc="Valve Source Engine game language resource file localization tool" /]
[title_desc name="Captioneer" desc="With Captioneer you can easily create your own Closed Captions for Source-based Games, like for Team Fortress 2." /]
[title_desc name="BSPIN" desc="Work-in-progress Linux tool for manipulating .bsp files (Used by Valve's Source Engine to store map data)" /]

[title_desc name="QWERTY Hammer Kit" desc="This is an all-in-one kit that comes with both Hammer 3.4 and 3.5, Auto Seamer, Batch Compiler, BSP Viewer, BSP2MAP, Crafty, GCF Scape, Leak Marker, MAP Viewer, Model Viewer, PAK Explorer, Revolver, Sprite Explorer, Sprite Fixer, Sprite Viewer, Sprite Wizard, Terrain Generator, Texture Extractor, Valve Compile Tools, Wally, WinBSPC, and ZHLT." /]
[title_desc name="FLRGen" desc="Alternative to Resgen, Download at own risk" /]
[title_desc name="HL Editing Lite" desc="Large collection of all the typical tools used in Modding" /]
[title_desc name="GCF Extractor" desc="extract gcfs" /]
[title_desc name="TM GCF Extractor" desc="TM GCF Extractor" /]

[title_desc name="Nightfire Editor Suite 2" desc="The second release of 007 Nightfire\'s PC modding tools originally released many years ago including Gearcraft, Model Compiler, Map Decompiler and more." /]
[title_desc name="BRET (Bsp REs Tool)" desc="Tool (Utility) for generating .res files for GoldSource .bsp engine maps" /]

[title_desc name="ResGuy" desc="Resguy is similar to RESgen and FLRGen, but can find all content that Sven Co-op maps are allowed to customize and only includes what is required" home_link="https://github.com/wootguy/resguy" /]
